name: webinarPolls
description:
List all the [polls](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203749865-Polling-for-Webinars) of a Webinar.

**Scopes:** `webinar:read:admin` `webinar:read`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

webinarId.description: The webinar ID in "**long**" format(represented as int64 data type in JSON).

$ul: **total_records**: The number of all records available across pages
